description: Google Search Console provides tools to monitor, maintain, and troubleshoot your site's presence in Google Search results.

capabilities.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_GET_SITEMAP
capabilities.description: Retrieves information about a specific sitemap for a site.

capabilities.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_INSPECT_URL
capabilities.description: Inspects a URL for indexing issues and status in Google Search Console.

capabilities.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_LIST_SITEMAPS
capabilities.description: Lists all sitemaps for a site in Google Search Console.

capabilities.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_LIST_SITES
capabilities.description: Lists all sites owned by the authenticated user in Google Search Console.

capabilities.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_SEARCH_ANALYTICS_QUERY
capabilities.description: Queries Google Search Console for search analytics data including clicks, impressions, CTR, and position metrics.

capabilities.name: GOOGLE_SEARCH_CONSOLE_SUBMIT_SITEMAP
capabilities.description: Submits a sitemap to Google Search Console for indexing.
